item.title: Naga Chaitanya, Rana Daggubati, Vijay Deverakonda meet Pushpa 2 star Allu Arjun after his release from jail. Watch videos - The Indian Express
item.description:
Naga Chaitanya, Rana Daggubati, Vijay Deverakonda meet Pushpa 2 star Allu Arjun after his release from jail. Watch videos.

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Indian Express

After his emotional release from jail, Allu Arjun received a warm welcome from his friends and family, including notable actors and the director of his film Pushpa 2.

  • Allu Arjun was released from jail after being arrested in connection with a tragic incident at a screening of his film.
  • Vijay Deverakonda, Naga Chaitanya, Rana Daggubati, and director Sukumar were present to greet him.
  • Many videos and photos of the reunion were shared on social media.
  • The incident that led to Arjun's arrest resulted in a woman's death during a stampede at a premiere event.
  • Despite the challenges, the actor was seen in good spirits, interacting with his friends and family.
"Vijay Deverakonda visiting #AlluArjun shows real brotherhood, fans love this bond!" — Madhu (@MadhuOmNamo)

Arjun's return was marked by affection from both his family and peers, highlighting the strong support network surrounding him during this difficult time.

item.title: Ranbir-Alia channel Raj Kapoor-core, Saif-Kareena bring Nawabi flair to greatest showman's centenary celebrations - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ranbir-Alia channel Raj Kapoor-core, Saif-Kareena bring Nawabi flair to greatest showman's centenary celebrations

Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The celebrations marking the centenary of Raj Kapoor brought together prominent members of the Kapoor family, showcasing stunning fashion and honoring the legacy of Indian cinema's greatest showman.

  • Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt opened the event at the Prime Minister's residence, inviting guests to a celebration in Mumbai.
  • Ranbir donned a midnight velveteen bandhgala, resembling Raj Kapoor, while Alia wore a vintage-inspired Sabyasachi saree.
  • Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan showcased their Nawabi heritage with elegant traditional attire.
  • Vicky Kaushal also captured attention with a sharp pinstriped suit, adding to the evening's fashion highlight.
  • Fashion trends of the night leaned heavily on retro styles, celebrating the iconic era of the 60s.
"Alia looked sophisticated-ly sultry while Saif and Kareena looked every bit the Nawab and Begum."

The night was a grand salute to the legacy of Raj Kapoor, as stars paid tribute through their attire, embodying the essence and glamour of Indian cinema’s rich history.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer holds well on second Friday, rises to 850cr in India - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer holds well on second Friday, rises to 850cr in India

Publication Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has achieved impressive box office success, grossing a total of Rs. 853 crore in India, approaching the Rs. 1000 crore milestone.

  • On its second Friday, Pushpa 2 earned approximately Rs. 42.50 crore.
  • The film experienced minimal collection drops and even some growth in Telugu states from Thursday.
  • Pushpa 2’s second Friday gross is the second highest of all time, trailing only Baahubali 2.
  • The film has already surpassed Rs. 1000 crore worldwide as of Wednesday.
  • Territorial box office breakdown shows AP/TS leading with Rs. 234.50 crore, followed by the Hindi Belt at Rs. 485 crore.

“It was essential for it to hold well on the second Friday to hope for a strong second-week hold, and the film has done better than it probably needed to.”

Pushpa 2 is on course to challenge the box office record held by Baahubali 2 as it continues its successful run in theaters.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 14, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Horoscope Today, December 14, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs

Publication Date: Dec 14, 2024 | Source: India Today

Find out answers to your deepest burning questions related to love, health, money, career in this daily horoscope for all zodiac signs.

  • Aries: Focus on family traditions, with a supportive environment and opportunities for wealth. Lucky numbers: 7, 8, 9; Lucky colour: Brown.
  • Taurus: New opportunities and pleasant journeys; creativity is emphasized. Lucky numbers: 5, 6, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Silver.
  • Gemini: Avoid carelessness; sensitivity in relationships; follow rules. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Light Blue.
  • Cancer: Positive progress with finances and business; significant tasks completed. Lucky numbers: 2, 5, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Aqua Blue.
  • Leo: Progress in endeavors; collaboration yields gains; positive impressions left. Lucky numbers: 1, 5, 7; Lucky colour: Purple.
  • Virgo: Strengthen faith and spirituality; commendable professional performance expected. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Sea Blue.
  • Libra: Maintain patience and discipline; strengthen family ties. Lucky numbers: 5, 6, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Royal Blue.
  • Scorpio: Achieve goals through collaboration; advance plans on property. Lucky numbers: 7, 8, 9; Lucky colour: Wheat.
  • Sagittarius: Diligence needed in professional matters; remain cautious and disciplined. Lucky numbers: 3, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Yellow.
  • Capricorn: Demonstrate competence; focus on innovation and smart working. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Purple.
  • Aquarius: Maintain harmony; avoid stubbornness; simplify emotional matters. Lucky numbers: 5, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Sapphire Blue.
  • Pisces: Enhance social interactions; maintain discipline in management tasks. Lucky numbers: 3, 6, 7, 8; Lucky colour: Gooseberry Green.
“Opportunities for wealth and property will grow.” - Aries Horoscope

This daily horoscope offers insights and predictions to guide you through December 14, 2024, focusing on various aspects of life for each zodiac sign.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 14, 2024 predicts no mishaps at work - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 14, 2024 predicts no mishaps at work

Publication Date: December 14, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope emphasizes a balanced approach for Pisces, urging individuals to use their intuition and practical decision-making for success in various aspects of life.

  • Focus on emotional insights and practical decisions in relationships, career, and health.
  • Encouragement for clear communication in love and relationships.
  • Creativity and intuition favored in the workplace for innovative solutions.
  • Financial caution is advised, with a focus on budget management.
  • Health routines should prioritize mindfulness and balance.
“Taking time for self-care will enhance your well-being.”

In conclusion, Pisces individuals are encouraged to maintain balance in their emotional and practical pursuits to achieve harmony and success in their daily lives.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 14, 2024 predicts new beginnings - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 14, 2024 predicts new beginnings

Publication Date: Dec 14, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

  • Innovative thinking is encouraged to solve problems and strengthen personal relationships.
  • Romantic connections can deepen with genuine communication and attentiveness.
  • Career advancements are possible through creativity and proactive engagement with colleagues.
  • Financial decisions should be smart and measured, with a focus on budgeting and avoiding impulsive spending.
  • Health should be prioritized with engaging activities, a balanced diet, and staying hydrated.
"Positive changes are on the horizon, but they will require a bit of effort and patience."

Overall, today is a significant day for Aquarius, filled with opportunities for growth in various aspects of life, encouraging them to harness their creative potential and deepen their connections.

item.title: Untitled Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 14 Dec 2024 predicts joyful moments - Hindustan Times

In conclusion, today is a favorable day for Sagittarius to embrace joy, build connections, and pursue opportunities across various aspects of life.

item.title: Anurag Kashyap’s ex-wife Kalki Koechlin congratulates his daughter Aaliyah Kashyap on wedding: ‘Wish you guys all the ishq, pyaar and mohabbat’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Anurag Kashyap’s ex-wife Kalki Koechlin congratulates his daughter Aaliyah Kashyap on wedding: ‘Wish you guys all the ishq, pyaar and mohabbat’

Publication Date: [Insert Date] | Source: The Indian Express

Actor Kalki Koechlin extended her congratulations to Aaliyah Kashyap and Shane Gregoire following their wedding, showcasing the amicable relationship she maintains with her ex-husband Anurag Kashyap.

  • Kalki Koechlin congratulated Aaliyah Kashyap on her wedding via an Instagram post.
  • The note included various quotes from literature and songs, emphasizing love and adventure.
  • Aaliyah Kashyap married Shane Gregoire in a traditional ceremony in Mumbai.
  • The relationship between Kalki and Anurag remains positive despite their divorce in 2015.
“Wish you guys all the ‘ishq, pyaar and mohabbat’ in the world (like the theme of a thousand Bollywood films)” - Kalki Koechlin

The heartfelt message from Kalki reflects a spirit of love and celebration for the newlyweds, continuing the legacy of warmth between her and Anurag’s family despite their past.
